description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Mushrooms With Bread, Tomatoes & Feta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Grilled Mushrooms With Bread, Tomatoes & Feta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 anchovies in oil, drained and chopped
1 tsp fresh rosemary leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C, and heat the barbecue or charcoal grill until hot. Put the mushrooms, lemon zest and juice, and half the olive oil in a bowl, and stir to combine. Season with salt and black pepper. Grill the mushrooms on both sides over a high heat for 10-15 minutes. Set aside.

Tear the bread into bite-sized pieces, and put on a baking tray. Toss with the garlic, anchovies, thyme, rosemary, remaining olive oil, and lots of black pepper. Spread out over the tray, and bake for about 15 minutes until the bread is golden and crisp.

To serve, combine the mushrooms and bread in a bowl, and divide among 4 serving plates. Arrange the tomatoes over the top. Top with the feta cheese, garnish with the parsley, and drizzle over a little extra virgin olive oil. Serve immediately.
